turns.content: I'm creating a product photography business. Which categories do companies want to have their products put in? For example, white background is one. People also like outdoor lifestyle photography for certain gear. Countertop in a cozy kitchen is useful for kitchen gadgets, etc. Please name 20 categories in a list. Do not name the product category themselves but the photography setting. For example, instead of naming toys, you might name a family room, a play table, kids playing with the toy etc.

1. White background
2. Outdoor lifestyle
3. Countertop in a cozy kitchen
4. Home office setting
5. Studio setup
6. Urban cityscape
7. Nature backdrop
8. Industrial setting
9. Nighttime cityscape
10. Rustic farm
11. Sports setting
12. Beach/Coastal setting
13. Formal event setup
14. Children's playroom
15. Modern interior design
16. Vintage/retro setting
17. Gym/fitness setting
18. Technology-focused setting
19. Travel destination backdrop
20. Artistic/creative studio setup
Create a table from the list and for each category, include in another column examples of products that would be best photographed in this category

| Photography Setting | Examples of Products |
| --- | --- |
| White Background | Electronics, Beauty Products, Accessories, Clothing, Toys |
| Outdoor Lifestyle | Hiking gear, Camping equipment, Sports gear |
| Countertop in a Cozy Kitchen | Kitchen Gadgets, Cookware, Food Products |
| Home Office Setting | Office Supplies, Electronics, Furniture, Desk Accessories |
| Studio Setup | Jewelry, Clothing, Shoes, Electronics |
| Urban Cityscape | Electronics, Clothing, Accessories, Outdoor Gear |
| Nature Backdrop | Outdoor Gear, Environmental Products, Eco-Friendly Products |
| Industrial Setting | Tools, Machinery, Industrial Products, Workwear |
| Nighttime Cityscape | Outdoor Gear, Technology, Fashion, Accessories |
| Rustic Farm | Kitchenware, Cookware, Tools, Agricultural Products |
| Sports Setting | Athletic Wear, Sports Gear, Equipment |
| Beach/Coastal Setting | Swimwear, Beach Gear, Sunscreen, Hats |
| Formal Event Setup | Clothing, Accessories, Jewelry, Fragrances |
| Children's Playroom | Toys, Educational Games, Books, Children's Clothing |
| Modern Interior Design | Home Decor, Furniture, Lighting, Housewares |
| Vintage/Retro Setting | Clothing, Accessories, Home Decor, Furniture |
| Gym/Fitness Setting | Athletic Wear, Fitness Equipment, Supplements, Health Products |
| Technology-Focused Setting | Electronics, Gadgets, Devices, Virtual Reality, Gaming |
| Travel Destination Backdrop | Luggage, Travel Accessories, Cameras, Outdoor Gear |
| Artistic/Creative Studio Setup | Art Supplies, Paints, Photography Equipment, Musical Instruments |
